content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect pipes. Check the area for any obstructing entities before trying to connect.

### Errors when adding fuel to boiler
- Make sure there is a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to add fuel to the boiler.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify that the specified positions contain the correct entity types before attempting to retrieve them. If the entity has been removed or was never placed, you will encounter errors.

### Errors when removing entities
- Ensure that the second argument used in the remove entity command is a valid Position object. Double-check the syntax and data types being used.

### General placement errors
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
